results.name: a(n) = 12*n^2 - 8*n + 1.
comment: Sequence found by reading the line from 1, in the direction 1, 5, and the same line from 5, in the direction 5, 33, ..., in the square spiral whose vertices are the generalized octagonal numbers A001082. - _Omar E. Pol_, May 08 2018
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3, -3, 1).
mathematica: Table[12n^2-8n+1,{n,0,50}] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[{3,-3,1},{1,5,33},50] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 07 2015 *)
xref: For n > 0: odd terms in A001859.
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 20 2012
